DESCRIPTION: Setup twitch alerts for your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}twitch subscribe [Twitch Username]** ~ Subscribes to a twitch streamer.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}twitch unsubscribe [Twitch Username]** ~ Removes the subscription to a twitch streamer.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}twitch subscribe [Twitch Username] [Twitch Game]** ~ Subscribes to a twitch stream **ONLY** when they stream this game.
ALIASES: Twitch does not have any aliases.
SUBSCRIBED: Successfully subscribed to twitch alerts for {{username}} on {{channel}}.
NOT_SUBSCRIBED: The {{username}} has no subscriptions set up for twitch at this time.
NOT_SUBBED: The {{username}} has no subscriptions set up for this channel at this time.
ALREADY_SUBBED: The {{username}} is already subscribed to send alerts in this channel.
